definition: (fig.) to fight a one-sided battle/to have an unfair advantage in a contest

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

sentences.english: In the downdraft from a commodity sell-off, the dollar would be the perverse winner.
sentences.chinese: 隨着商品證券跌價，美元將會成爲勝之不武的贏家。
